itinerary.route: Happy Isles to Little Yosemite Valley
itinerary.mapNote: First camp. Merced River canyon. 1830m.

itinerary.route: LYV to Sunrise High Sierra Camp
itinerary.mapNote: Historic Sierra Club camp at granite basin. 2933m.
Largest subalpine meadow in Sierra. Store + PO resupply. 2621m.
Flat meadow camp along Lyell Fork. 2960m.
Iconic lake below Banner Peak. 2928m.

itinerary.route: Thousand Island Lake to Reds Meadow
itinerary.mapNote: Hot springs, café, resupply. Rainbow Falls nearby. 2278m.
High lake camp in granite basin. 3099m.
Remote granite lake camp. 3301m.

itinerary.route: Virginia Lake to VVR / Edison Lake
itinerary.mapNote: Resupply point. Ferry across Edison Lake. 2155m.
Forested creek camp after VVR. 2621m.
High lake before Selden Pass. 3332m.

itinerary.route: Marie Lake to Muir Trail Ranch
itinerary.mapNote: Hiker resupply buckets. Hot springs. 1143m (lowest point on JMT).

itinerary.route: Muir Trail Ranch to Evolution Creek
itinerary.mapNote: After Evolution Valley climb. Named Darwinian peaks surround. 2988m.
Before Muir Pass 3657m. Muir Hut visible. 3447m.
LeConte Canyon camp. North Fork Kings River. 2636m.
Before Mather Pass 3889m. Broad Kings River headwaters basin. 3534m.
Famous suspension bridge camp. South Fork Kings River. 2804m.
Beautiful chain of lakes below Glen Pass. 3322m.
Below Forester Pass. Bubbs Creek confluence. 3008m.
After Forester Pass 4009m (JMT highpoint). 3569m.
Highpoint of contiguous USA 4421m. Trailhead at Whitney Portal. 2550m.

waypoints.name: Forester Pass
waypoints.note: Highest point on JMT and PCT combined. Vertical granite chute.

waypoints.name: Muir Pass
waypoints.note: Muir Hut (1931) at summit. Moonscape plateau above treeline.

waypoints.name: Glen Pass
waypoints.note: Above Rae Lakes. Dramatic Kings Canyon granite.

waypoints.name: Pinchot Pass
waypoints.note: Remote and rarely crowded. South Fork Kings watershed.

waypoints.name: Mather Pass
waypoints.note: Steep south-side switchbacks above Upper Basin.

waypoints.name: Donohue Pass
waypoints.note: Ansel Adams Wilderness boundary. Classic granite scenery.

waypoints.name: Mount Whitney Summit
waypoints.note: Highest peak in contiguous USA. JMT and PCT southern terminus.

waypoints.name: Half Dome
waypoints.note: Yosemite icon. Optional cable route from JMT. Permit required.

waypoints.name: Thousand Island Lake
waypoints.note: Banner Peak reflection. Most photographed lake on the JMT.

waypoints.name: Guitar Lake
waypoints.note: Guitar-shaped tarn below Whitney. Last camp before summit day.
